list.name: Super Awesome Trigger #1
list.desc:
Green, short hair almost fully covers a handsome, tense face. Beady black eyes, set handsomely within their sockets, watch affectionately over the families they've sworn to protect for so long.
A scar reaching from the top of the right cheek , running towards the left side of his lips and ending on his forehead leaves a stinging burden of forbidden adventures.

This is the face of Gnobflink Steambonk, a true ally among gnomes. He stands tall above others, despite his sturdy frame.

There's something extraordinary about him, perhaps it's his sense of comradery or perhaps it's simply his perseverance. But nonetheless, people tend to treat him like family, while trying to please him.

list.name: This trigger is not so good, but we like it
list.desc:
Silver, sleek hair gently hangs over a long, warm face. Heavy pink eyes, set gracefully within their sockets, watch vigorously over the families they've felt disconnected from for so long.
Tribal marks in the form of 2 stripes on each side of the face, running from just above the eyes to the bottom of the cheeks marks her legacy but, more importantly and leaves an aching burden of her fortunate past.

The is the face of Leadrieth Lunadancer, a true pioneer among dark elves. She stands alluringly among others, despite her sturdy frame.

There's something puzzling about her, perhaps it's a feeling of coldness or perhaps it's simply her personality. But nonetheless, people tend to buy her a drink, while secretly dispising her.

list.name: I will use expression here, get ready for this
list.desc:
Brown, shaggy hair neatly coiffured to reveal a furrowed, menacing face. Round hazel eyes, set low within their sockets, watch wearily over the rivers they've looked after for so long.
Soft skin graciously compliments his cheekbones and leaves an amusing memory of his upbringing.

This is the face of Brycen Chilson, a true utopian among humans. He stands high among others, despite his brawny frame.

There's something wonderful about him, perhaps it's his odd companions or perhaps it's simply his personality. But nonetheless, people tend to worship him, while spreading stories about him.
